DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine whether CYP3A ( Cytochrome P450 3A ) and/or P-glycoprotein mediate interaction exist garlic supplement oxycodone ( commonly use oral opioid analgesic ) healthy volunteer . OUTLINE : This single-blind , randomize , crossover study . Participants randomize 1 2 arm . Each arm entail two 30-day treatment period , washout least 4 week . - Arm I : In Period 1 , participant receive oral garlic powder twice daily day 1-28 oral oxycodone day 28 . In Period 2 , participant receive oral placebo twice daily day 1-28 oral oxycodone day 28 . - Arm II : In Period 1 , participant receive oral placebo twice daily day 1-28 oral oxycodone day 28 . In Period 2 , participant receive oral garlic powder twice daily day 1-28 oral oxycodone day 28 . In period arm , participant receive combination oral midazolam oral digoxin CYP3A P-glycoprotein phenotyping day 29 . Blood sample collect periodically analyzed liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry ( LC-MS ) . Blood urine sample collect receive oxycodone pharmacokinetic characterization . Plasma concentration oxycodone metabolite measure LC-MS . Response experimentally induce pain Cold Pressor Test ( CPT ) assess baseline periodically oxycodone treatment .
